azurerm_iothub_shared_access_policy.description: Manages an IotHub Shared Access Policy

name.description: Specifies the name of the IotHub Shared Access Policy resource. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group under which the IotHub Shared Access Policy resource has to be created. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

iothub_name.description: The name of the IoTHub to which this Shared Access Policy belongs. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

registry_read.description: Adds `RegistryRead` permission to this Shared Access Account. It allows read access to the identity registry.

registry_write.description: Adds `RegistryWrite` permission to this Shared Access Account. It allows write access to the identity registry.
